title: Employee attendance tracker with Telegram Bot and Google Sheets
description:
## Attendance Telegram App with Google Sheets

Manage employee attendance directly through **Telegram** with seamless **Google Sheets** integration.  
Employees can check in, check out, and view their daily attendance status from a Telegram bot.  
All records are stored in Google Sheets for easy tracking and reporting.

üëâ Includes a **Google Sheets template** to get started quickly.

---

### ‚ú® Features
- üïò **Check-in & Check-out** via Telegram bot  
- üìä **View daily attendance status** (Check-in/Check-out done or not)  
- üîí **Employee validation** ‚Äì only registered employees can log attendance  
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Duplicate prevention** ‚Äì prevents multiple check-ins/outs on the same day  
- üìÇ **Google Sheets integration** ‚Äì easy to manage, export, and share data  

---

### üõ† Requirements
- [n8n](https://n8n.io/) (Cloud or Self-hosted)  
- A Telegram Bot (create via **BotFather**)  
- Google Sheets account  

---

### üöÄ Setup Instructions

### 1. Import Workflow
1. Download and import `Attendance Telegram App.json` into n8n.  
2. Configure your **Telegram API credentials**.  
3. Configure your **Google Sheets credentials**.  

### 2. Use Provided Google Sheets Template
We provide a template with two sheets:  
- **Employee** ‚Üí List of registered employees (`id_employee`, `full_name`, `username_telegram`)  
- **Attendance** ‚Üí Attendance logs (`date`, `time`, `attendance_type`, etc.)  

üëâ [Copy the Google Sheets Template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1miqc4zpTecMwk_qNHgM17na2rDsWNpICIblKy44hwnw/edit?usp=sharing)

Update the **Employee sheet** with your employee data before running the workflow.

### 3. Configure Telegram Bot
1. Create a bot with **BotFather** on Telegram.  
2. Copy the **API token**.  
3. Add it into n8n‚Äôs **Telegram credentials**.  

### 4. Run the Workflow
- Start the workflow.  
- Open your Telegram bot and type `/start` or `/menu`.  
- Available options:  
  - ‚úÖ **Check-in** (‚è∞)  
  - üö™ **Check-out** (üèÅ)  
  - üìä **View Today‚Äôs Attendance Status**  

---

## üìã Example Flow
1. User types `/menu` in Telegram.  
2. Bot displays menu with **Check-in/Check-out** and **Today‚Äôs Attendance Status**.  
3. If user taps **Check-in**:  
   - Workflow validates if they are a registered employee.  
   - Checks if attendance already exists for today.  
   - If valid ‚Üí record in Google Sheets.  
   - Bot replies: *‚ÄúCheck-in recorded. ‚è∞‚Äù*  

---
